item.title: readme
item.description: Welcome to my website. Here you will find a collection of anything I find interesting. Everything from python scripting to Minecraft builds are fair game. To search by categories, select “./tags”. To search by posted date, select “./posts”. Want to get in touch? Feel free to contact me using any of the sites linked on the home page or by email.

item.title: kicking_the_tires
item.description: I am currently trying to get this site up and running. I have no experience using HUGO to build websites making this quite a challenge. The current plan is to get a git repository set up. I’m hoping I can have the server update the site itself when it detects a push to the site’s repository. Not sure how to do this yet. On the positive side, I have figured out a bunch about how theming and configuring HUGO sites works.
